channel.title: Big problem! help! big problem! help! big problem!
channel.description:
GUYS! i have a reallllllly big problem!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
i screwed up my npchandler.java
i couldnt fix it so i accidently restored my server files to a previous backup date (like this):
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/bandicam2011-06-1320-04-05-328.jpg[/img]
see how it says 'Restore previous versions'
i clicked that by mistake!! is there anyway to under a computer user's actions!!!!!!!!?!?!?!? HELP ME!!!!!!!

item.title: Big problem! help! big problem! help! big problem!
item.dc:creator: @ImNoHacker ImNoHacker
item.description:
@ImNoHacker wrote:

If you were able to restore it to a earlier version than there has to be a directory for it to have saved the previous version. If not, than i’d say try restoring your computer. Someone already said that doesn’t work. Depending on what OS you have, this could be a hard fix. Possibly an easy fix. Or quite possibly never gonna happen.

Read full topic
item.source: Big problem! help! big problem! help! big problem!

item.title: Big problem! help! big problem! help! big problem!
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

I think CTRL - Z might work. Other than that, redownload the source and replace npchandler.java, or look in your recycle bin, etc. And this isn’t really the place to post this? Try going on some computer sites and googling around.

Read full topic
item.source: Big problem! help! big problem! help! big problem!

item.title: Big problem! help! big problem! help! big problem!
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

[quote=“macca4g, post:2, topic:399081”]do a system restore to like 3-4 days ago and everything you lost will come back =-)

Hope i helped[/quote]
System restored only restores installed programs, and system files. Unless it’s a system file, It will not be restored.

Read full topic
item.source: Big problem! help! big problem! help! big problem!

item.title: Big problem! help! big problem! help! big problem!
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

Whell your first mistake was coming and posting here.
What i mean is when you accidentally do something on a computer
You should press “cntr+z” or “Undo” as soon as you make the mistake
. Sometimes that works, sometimes it doesn’t.

Read full topic
item.source: Big problem! help! big problem! help! big problem!

item.title: Big problem! help! big problem! help! big problem!
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

do a system restore to like 3-4 days ago and everything you lost will come back =-)

Hope i helped

Read full topic
